title: # 358 - Joe List & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Joe List to talk about crazy drinking stories, why he doesn't want kids, sexually transmitted infections, and that time he shit in a girls shoe. 

Check out hit podcast that he does with Mark Normand "Tuesdays with Stories" wherever you get your podcasts.

This episode is brought to you by Vincero Watches. get 15% off when you go to www.vincerowatches.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout.

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Policy Genius. If you need life insurance but haven't gotten around to it, go to www.policygenius.com to get quotes and apply in minutes. 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. Get started today for just $5 when you go to www.forhims.com/bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by ARC. Get $15 off your purchase of a Blue Light kit when you visit www.arcsmile.com and use promo code "Bert" at checkout.

The Body Shots Fall Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE:
http://www.bertbertbert.com
